prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon with fluffy white fur and a long, green tail.
I want a friendly water-type Pokemon that has a playful demeanor and loves to explore.
Generate an image of a unique Normal-type Pokemon resembling a dragon with a gentle face.
Make a whimsical Pokemon that combines characteristics of dragons and dogs, emphasizing its friendly nature.
Imagine a Pokemon that can glide gracefully through the air, with bright green and white colors.
Design an enchanting creature with a dragon-like appearance, perfect for a lush forest setting.
Show me a mythical creature that embodies the spirit of a wise dragon with soft features.
